  • **Pitched Battle** 1,000 (Order - Stormcast Eternals) [1,000pts]

    Rules: At the Double, Forward to Victory, Inspiring Presence

    • Leader [110pts]

      • Lord-Veritant [110pts]

        Selections: 0. Deathly Aura, 0. Soulthief, General, Judgement Blade

        Categories: CELESTIAL, HUMAN, HERO, PRIEST, ORDER, STORMCAST ETERNALS, Leader, LORD-VERITANT, General, 6_under_wounds, Artefact

        Artefact: Soulthief, Command Trait: Deathly Aura, Unit: Lord-Veritant, Unit Abilities: Bound in Service, Faithful Gryph-hound, Lantern of Abjuration, Sanction, Weapon: Judgement Blade

        • Faithful Gryph-hound

          Selections: Beak and Claws

          Categories: CELESTIAL, GRYPH-HOUNDS, ORDER, STORMCAST ETERNALS, Other

          Unit: Gryph-Hounds, Unit Abilities: Darting Attacks, Gryph-Hound Alpha, Loyal Companion, Warning Cry, Weapon: Beak and Claws


        Artefact Artefact Details Ref
        Soulthief Pick one of the bearer’s melee weapons. At the end of the combat phase, roll a dice for each enemy model that was allocated any wounds caused by this weapon in that combat phase. On a 3+ that model suffers 1 mortal wound.
        Command Trait Command Trait Details Ref
        Deathly Aura Subtract 1 from the Bravery characteristic of enemy units while they are within 6" of this general.
        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave Ref
        Gryph-Hounds 9"36-
        Lord-Veritant 5"693+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Bound in Service Add 3 to the unbinding roll for this model’s Lantern of Abjuration if there is a friendly GRYPH-HOUND model within 6" of the enemy WIZARD attempting to cast the spell.
        Darting Attacks Each time this unit attacks, it can make a 6" retreat move after all of its attacks have been resolved.
        Faithful Gryph-hound The first time this model is set up on the battlefield, you can call a GRYPH-HOUND unit consisting of a single model to the battlefield and add it to your army. Set up the GRYPH-HOUND wholly within 3" of this model and more than 9" from any enemy units.
        Gryph-Hound Alpha If a unit of Gryph-hounds has 3 or more models, one Gryph-hound can be a Gryph-hound Alpha. Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of a Gryph-hound Alpha’s Beak and Claws.
        Lantern of Abjuration This model can unbind one spell in each enemy hero phase in the same manner as a WIZARD.
        Loyal Companion Add 2 to the Attacks characteristic of this unit’s Beak and Claws while this unit is wholly within 6" of a friendly LORD-CASTELLANT or LORD-VERITANT.
        Sanction In your hero phase, you can pick 1 enemy WIZARD within 7" of this model and roll a dice. On a 4+ that enemy unit suffers D3 mortal wounds.
        Warning Cry If a reserve enemy unit is set up on the battlefield for the first time within 10" of this unit, friendly STORMCAST ETERNAL units wholly within 9" of this unit can attack that reserve unit with all of the missile weapons they are armed with. A unit that uses this ability to attack a reserve unit cannot use this ability to attack another reserve unit in the same phase.
        Weapon TypeRangeAttacksTo HitTo WoundRendDamage Ref
        Beak and Claws Melee1"23+4+-1
        Judgement Blade Melee1"43+3+-12

      • Liberators [90pts]

        Selections: 5 Liberators, Grandhammer, Warhammer and Shield

        Categories: CELESTIAL, HUMAN, LIBERATORS, REDEEMER, ORDER, STORMCAST ETERNALS, Battleline

        Unit: Liberator, Unit Abilities: Lay Low the Tyrants, Liberator-Prime, Paired Weapons, Sigmarite Shields, Weapon: Grandhammer, Warhammer(s)


        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave Ref
        Liberator 5"274+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Lay Low the Tyrants You can add 1 to hit rolls for attacks made by this unit that target an enemy unit with a Wounds characteristic of 5 or more.
        Liberator-Prime The leader of this unit is a Liberator-Prime. Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of a Liberator-Prime’s melee weapon.
        Paired Weapons Each unmodified hit roll of 6 made for a model armed with either a pair or warhammers or a pair of warblades inflicts 2 hits on the target instead of 1. Make a wound and save roll for each hit.
        Sigmarite Shields You can re-roll save rolls of 1 for attacks that target this unit if any models from this unit are carrying Sigmarite Shields.

      • Vanguard-Palladors [170pts]

        Selections: 3 Vanguard-Palladors [170pts], Boltstorm Pistol, Razor Beak and Claws, Starstrike Javelin

        Categories: ANGELOS, CELESTIAL, HUMAN, VANGUARD-PALLADORS, ORDER, STORMCAST ETERNALS, Other

        Unit: Vanguard-Pallador, Unit Abilities: Aethereal Strike, Lunar Blade, Mount, Pallador-Prime, Ride the Winds Aetheric, Weapon: Boltstorm Pistol, Razor Beak and Claws, Starstrike Javelin, Starstrike Javelin (Missile)


        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave Ref
        Vanguard-Pallador 12"574+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Aethereal Strike If the unmodified hit roll for an attack made with a Gryph-charger’s Razor Beak and Claws is 6, that attack inflicts 1 mortal wound on the target and the attack sequence ends (do not make a wound or save roll).
        Lunar Blade Each time a model armed with a Lunar Blade attacks, after all of that model’s attacks have been resolved, you can pick 1 enemy unit within 1" of that model and roll a dice. On a 2+ the unit you picked suffers 1 mortal wound.
        Mount This unit’s Gryph-chargers attack with their Razor Beak and Claws.
        Pallador-Prime The leader of this unit is a Pallador-Prime. A Pallador-Prime is armed with a Lunar Blade in addition to their other weapons.
        Ride the Winds Aetheric In your movement phase, this model can Ride the Winds Aetheric instead of moving normally. If it does so, choose the direction in which it will move, and roll 6D6. This model can move up to a number of inches equal to the result in the direction chosen, moving over terrain and other models as if it could fly. It must end the move more than 3" from enemy models – if this is impossible, it cannot move at all. This model cannot charge in a turn in which it Rides the Winds Aetheric.
        Weapon TypeRangeAttacksTo HitTo WoundRendDamage Ref
        Boltstorm Pistol Missile9"23+4+-1
        Razor Beak and Claws Melee1"33+3+-21
        Starstrike Javelin Melee2"14+3+-11
        Starstrike Javelin (Missile) Missile18"13+3+-11

      • Vanguard-Raptors with Longstrike Crossbows [340pts]

        Selections: 2x 3 Vanguard-Raptors with Longstrike Crossbows [340pts], Beak and Claws, Heavy Stock, Longstrike Crossbow

        Categories: CELESTIAL, HUMAN, JUSTICAR, VANGUARD-RAPTORS, ORDER, STORMCAST ETERNALS, Other

        Unit: Vanguard-Raptor with Longstrike Crossbow, Unit Abilities: Headshot, Hunting Call, Longshot, Raptor-Prime, Weapon: Beak and Claws, Heavy Stock, Longstrike Crossbow


        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave Ref
        Vanguard-Raptor with Longstrike Crossbow 5"274+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Headshot If the unmodified hit roll for an attack made with a Longstrike Crossbow is 6, that attack inflicts 2 mortal wounds on the target and the attack sequence ends (do not make a wound or save roll).
        Hunting Call If an enemy unit finishes a charge move within 1" of a friendly unit that includes a Raptor-Prime, roll a dice for each model in that Raptor-Prime’s unit. For each 6+, the charging unit suffers 2 mortal wounds.
        Longshot Add 6" to the Range characteristic of this unit’s Longstrike Crossbows if this unit did not move in the movement phase of the same turn.
        Raptor-Prime The leader of this unit is a Raptor-Prime. A Raptor-Prime is accompanied by an Aetherwing, which attacks with its Beak and Claws. For rules purposes, it is treated in the same manner as a mount.
        Weapon TypeRangeAttacksTo HitTo WoundRendDamage Ref
        Beak and Claws Melee1"24+3+-1

    • Allegiance

      • Allegiance

        Categories: Allegiance

        • Allegiance: Stormcast Eternals

          Selections: Anvils of the Heldenhammer, Stormkeep

          Battle Trait: Mortal Auxilliaries, No True Death, Shield of Civilisation, Stormhosts, Command Abilities: Heroes of Another Age


        Battle Trait Battle Trait Details Ref
        Mortal Auxilliaries 1 in every 4 units in a Stormkeep army can be a CITIES OF SIGMAR unit. Those units cannot be the army general. Add 1 to the Bravery characteristic of those units while they are wholly within 12" of a friendly LIBERATORS unit. In addition, when you pick a unit to benefit from a command ability from Battletome: Stormcast Eternals, you can treat those units as if they were STORMCAST ETERNALS units.
        No True Death You can re-roll failed battleshock tests for friendly ANVILS OF THE HELDENHAMMER units.
        Shield of Civilisation Add 1 to the Bravery characteristic of friendly STORMCAST ETERNALS units while they are wholly within 12" of any friendly LIBERATORS units. In addition, at the end of your movement phase, you can pick any friendly LIBERATORS units that
        did not move and were not set up in that phase and say they will stand fast. If you do so, until your next movement phase, you can add 1 to hit rolls for attacks made by those units, and you can add 1 to save rolls for attacks that target those units.
        Stormhosts If your army is a Stormcast Eternals army, you can give it a Stormhost keyword. All STORMCAST ETERNAL units in your army gain that keyword. If a model already has a Stormhost keyword, it cannot gain another one, but this does not prevent other units in your army from having a different Stormhost keyword. You can either choose one of the Stormhosts in the list, or choose another Stormhost you've read about or created yourself. If you choose from the list below, all units with that keyword benefit from the extra abilities listed for that Stormhost. If you choose a different Stormhost, simply pick the Stormhost that most closely matches the nature of your own Stormhost.
        Command Abilities Command Ability Details Ref
        Heroes of Another Age You can use this command ability in your hero phase. If you do so, pick a friendly ANVILS OF THE HELDENHAMMER unit wholly within 9" of a friendly ANVILS OF THE HELDENHAMMER HERO, or wholly within 18" of a friendly ANVILS OF THE HELDENHAMMER HERO that is a general. That unit can attack with all of the missile weapons it is armed with, or make a pile-in move and attack with all of the melee weapons it is armed with. You cannot pick the same unit to benefit from this command ability more than once per hero phase.

    • Realm of Battle

      • Realm of Battle

        Selections: Battle: Shyish

        Categories: Realm of Battle

        Command Abilities: Amethyst Aura, Spell: Ethereal Guide, Night's Touch, Ripples of the Necroquake, Soulflay, Soulshroud, Unnatural Darkness, Word of Ending


        Command Abilities Command Ability Details Ref
        Amethyst Aura You can use this command ability in your hero phase. If you do so, pick 1 friendly unit wholly within 12" of a friendly HERO. Until the end of that battle round, roll a dice each time you allocate a wound or mortal wound to that unit. On a 6, that wound or mortal wound is negated.
        Spell Casting ValueDescription Ref
        Ethereal Guide 6If successfully cast, add 1 to hit rolls for attacks made by the caster until your next hero phase. Malign Sorcery p76
        Night's Touch 8If successfully cast, pick a friendly unit within 6" of the caster that is visible to them. Ignore modifiers (positive and negative) when making save rolls for that unit until your next hero phase. Malign Sorcery p76
        Ripples of the Necroquake 7Until the end of that phase, add 1 to casting rolls made for friendly WIZARDS if the casting roll is for an endless spell.
        Soulflay 7If successfully cast, pick an enemy HERO within 12" of the caster that is visible to them. That unit suffers D3 mortal wounds. In addition, if the unit suffers 3 mortal wounds from this spell, subtract 2 from its Bravery characteristic until your next hero phase. Malign Sorcery p76
        Soulshroud 6If successfully cast, pick a friendly unit within 12" of the caster that is visible to them. That unit is not affected by other spells until your next hero phase. Malign Sorcery p76
        Unnatural Darkness 6If successfully cast, pick a friendly unit within 12" of the caster that is visible to them. Subtract 1 from hit rolls for attacks that target that unit until your next hero phase. Malign Sorcery p76
        Word of Ending 6If successfully cast, pick an enemy HERO within 12" of the caster that is visible to them and roll a dice. If the result is more than the number of wounds allocated to that model, it suffers D3 mortal wounds. Malign Sorcery p76

Force Rules

At the Double: You can use this command ability after you make a run roll for a friendly unit that is within 6" of a friendly HERO, or 12" of a friendly HERO that is a general. If you do so, the run roll is treated as being a 6. (Core Rules p3)

Forward to Victory: You can use this command ability after you make a charge roll for a friendly unit that is within 6" of a friendly HERO, or 12" of a friendly HERO that is a general. If you do so, re-roll the charge roll. (Core Rules p3)

Inspiring Presence: You can use this command ability at the start of the battleshock phase. If you do so, pick a friendly unit that is within 6" of friendly HERO, or 12" of a friendly HERO that is a general. That unit does not have to take battleshock tests in that phase. (Core Rules p3)
